pageProduct.name: Olay ProVital Night Cream 50g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Olay Anti-Wrinkle Provital Night Face Cream Moisturiser for Mature Skin intensively nourishes and helps strengthen your skin's moisture.

Why is this the right moisturiser for me?

The Olay Anti-Wrinkle Provital range has been specially designed to care for mature skin needs, helping to restore the moisture loss due to skin ageing and environmental factors.

How does Provital Night Cream work?

Its rich formula containing Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 intensively nourishes during the night, preparing it for the demands of the coming day.

Results:

Skin that looks and feels more supple and revitalised. For even better results, try Provital Day Cream for morning use.

Discover Olay. Skincare that meets the needs of every woman. Olay has evolved from once iconic beauty fluid to an extensive skincare brand that delivers younger looking, beautiful skin. With multiple ranges to choose from, women can be assured their skincare routine is tailored to meet their individual wants, needs, aspirations and concerns- be it hydration, sun protection, or targeting ageing. Women are therefore able to challenge what's possible with their skin.

Suitable For: Mature Skin

Product Claims: Night Cream for Mature Skin

Size: 50ml

KEY FEATURES

• Its rich formula containing Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 intensively nourishes and helps strengthen your skin's moisture barrier during the night, preparing it for the demands of the coming day.
• How does Provital Night Cream work?
Its rich formula containing Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 intensively nourishes during the night, preparing it for the demands of the coming day.
• Results
Skin that looks and feels more supple and revitalised.
• For even better results, try Provital Day Cream for morning use.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. If skin irritation develops, reduce frequency or discontinue use.
Important information, do not discard outer package.

Ingredients

WATER, GLYCERIN, CETYL PALMITATE, CETYL ALCOHOL, CYCLOPENTASILOXANE, STEARYL ALCOHOL, ISOPROPYL PALMITATE, PANTHENOL, DIMETHICONE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, CARBOMER, PEG-00 STEARATE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, PEG/PPG-8/8 DIMETHICONE, METHYLPARABEN, IMIDAZOLIDINYL UREA, FRAGRANCE, RETINYL PALMITATE, STEARIC ACID, PALMITIC ACID, TITANIUM DIOXIDE, PROPYLPARABEN, DISODIUM EDTA, ETHYLHEXYL STEARATE, TOCOPHEROL, LECITHIN, ASCORBYL PALMITATE, ZEA MAYS (CORN) OIL, BETA-CAROTENE

Directions

Smooth evenly onto cleansed face and neck every evening.

USAGE ADVICE

For even better results:
- Apply Anti-Wrinkle ProVital Night Cream for mature skin after cleansing with products from Olay cleansing lines.
- Why not try Anti-Wrinkle ProVital Day Cream for mature skin with SPF 15 for day use?

Use product only as directed.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
